# 尚硅谷前端技术之微信公众号

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shang-guigu-qianduan-jishu-zhiweixin-gongzhong-hao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shang-guigu-qianduan-jishu-zhiweixin-gongzhong-hao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shang-guigu-qianduan-jishu-zhiweixin-gongzhong-hao
shang-guigu-qianduan-jishu-zhiweixin-gongzhong-hao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shang-guigu-qianduan-jishu-zhiweixin-gongzhong-hao
shang-guigu-qianduan-jishu-zhiweixin-gongzhong-hao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
